Sylvia Lancaster, the mother of a 20-year-old woman who was murdered in 2007 because she was dressed as a goth, has died.
Lancaster died suddenly and unexpectedly on Tuesday morning, according to a … [+2143 chars]

articles.author: Rebecca Jones
articles.title: 'Don’t care Johnson broke law - what matters is results' Edwina Currie in huge row on GMB - Express
articles.description: EDWINA CURRIE has insisted she 'really doesn't care' if Boris Johnson broke the law as she warned against a resignation while the conflict continues in Ukraine, telling ITV viewers the Russian President 'would be laughing' if the Prime Minister stepped down.

articles.author: Verity Sulway
articles.title: 'Sickening' Gary Lineker reignites fierce row with 'bullying’ GMB host Richard Madeley - Express
articles.description: GARY LINEKER has reignited his row with Good Morning Britain host Richard Madeley after a fiery debate about an oil protest.

articles.author: Lizzy Cooney
articles.title: Millie Bobby Brown says media reaction to her turning 18 was ‘gross’ - The Independent
articles.description: ‘[I’m] definitely seeing a difference between the way people act and the way the press and social media react to me coming of age’
articles.content:
Millie Bobby Brown has spoken out about the gross sexualisation she has experienced throughout her career.
